= Compatible / Optional Hardware =

Here is a list of compatible and optional hardware that works with the UAVDevBoard, and is supported by MatrixPilot.


*GPS Units*
  * [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/465 EM506A GPS] (Recommended)
  * [http://store.diydrones.com/MediaTek_MT3329_GPS_10Hz_Adapter_Basic_p/mt3329-02.htm MediaTek GPS] (Recommended, and very cheap!)
  * [http://store.diydrones.com/GS407_U_Blox5_GPS_4Hz_p/spk-gps-gs407.htm uBlox GS407 GPS]

*Other Accessories*
  * [http://store.diydrones.com/product_p/br-ppme.htm PPM Encoder board]
  * [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/9530 OpenLog] (Recommended)
  * [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/9168 Experimental Native MatrixPilot OSD]
  * [http://www.sparkfun.com/search/results?term=xbee&what=products XBees]
  * [http://store.diydrones.com/HMC5843_Triple_Axis_Magnetometer_p/br-hmc5843-01.htm Magnetometer]
  * [http://www.happykillmore.com/Software/Faq.asp Remzibi OSD]
  * [https://www.sparkfun.com/products/544 microSD Memory Card Socket (for large filesystem support)]
